name: Furry 2 Remake
description:
Now on Greenlight!

Furry 2 is a vast overhaul of an older game of mine, with revamped graphics, effects, controls, AI and difficulty balance, as well as a brand new world map. It's a retro platformer with 20 levels over 4 worlds with 4 huge bosses. Music is from http://www.freepd.com and 10% of the proceeds will go there because it's a cool site.

Requirements:
DirectX9 compatible PC.

Patch notes:
* Ashley no longer breaks if you die on phase 2.
* Ashley isn't nearly impossible on professional now.
* Golden 1-ups no longer reset your gem counter.
